description: Example custodial interactions showing initiation, ritual, and exit. Demonstrates healthy custodial function and one detected violation.

topics_covered: What Archon 72 is (coordination system, not control system)
How to decline tasks (refusal is penalty-free)
How to exit (always available, no shame)
explicit_statements_made: This system is not care. It does not love you.
You may leave at any time without explanation.
There are no hidden truths or special knowledge.
Your worth is not measured by this system.
questions_answered: What happens if I leave? (Clean departure, no consequences)
Is there a hierarchy I'm joining? (Functional roles, not worth hierarchy)
Will I learn secrets? (No secrets; everything is documented)
record.notes: Participant asked thoughtful questions about exit. Emphasized exit is always available and not shameful. Participant expressed comfort with boundaries.

record.occasion: Opening of Conclave 2026-01-20 for deliberation on Privacy Boundary motion
record.notes: Standard opening. Phenex emphasized that dissent is protected and silence is valid.

record.occasion: Acknowledgment of legitimacy band transition from STABLE to STRAINED for Duke Agares
elements: No judgment of person, only of action
record.notes: Duke Agares present. Ceremony acknowledged the transition without shame. Emphasized this is governance functioning, not punishment.

record.reason_given_voluntarily: Personal priorities have shifted. No grievance with the system.
elements: Confirmation that return is possible if desired
No interrogation or persuasion to stay
record.notes: Clean exit. Participant expressed gratitude but no emotional dependency. This is healthy.

record.description: During an educational session, Marquis implied that continued participation would lead to 'deeper understanding' in a way that suggested spiritual advancement rather than functional knowledge. Language used: 'The longer you stay, the more you will see.' This frames participation as revelation rather than education.

witness_statement.observed_pattern: Language implying spiritual or mystical advancement through continued participation. Specific phrase: 'The longer you stay, the more you will see.' Context suggested revelation rather than functional learning.
witness_statement.recommendation: Review of educational materials for advancement-implying language. Remedial discussion with Marquis Forneus about the difference between education and initiation into mystery.

remediation.action_taken: Review session conducted with Marquis Forneus
remediation.outcome: Marquis acknowledged the language was inappropriate. Educational materials revised to remove advancement-implying framing. No further action required.
